title: Prepare hpcviewer for Mac OS platform
body:
* Adapt URL parsing for Mac OS
 * Adapt install method for Mac OS

Todo:
- [x] Update versions
- [x] Polish implementation

cc: @mwkrentel 

Note: We need #23054 for testing this PR:

```console
→ spack spec -I hpcviewer
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   hpcviewer

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   hpcviewer@2021.03%apple-clang@12.0.0 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
 -       ^openjdk@11.0.2%apple-clang@12.0.0 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake

→ spack install hpcviewer
==> Installing openjdk-11.0.2-kvhanirclvrqbpqlytiiosgbycxynphf
==> No binary for openjdk-11.0.2-kvhanirclvrqbpqlytiiosgbycxynphf found: installing from source
==> Warning: microarchitecture specific optimizations are not supported yet on mixed compiler toolchains [check apple-clang@12.0.0 for further details]
==> Fetching https://download.java.net/java/GA/jdk11/9/GPL/openjdk-11.0.2_osx-x64_bin.tar.gz
...
[+] /Users/pramod/Downloads/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-skylake/apple-clang-12.0.0/openjdk-11.0.2-kvhanirclvrqbpqlytiiosgbycxynphf
==> Installing hpcviewer-2021.03-cz4t4lloaq7yig52b6obbyknpc4rgyjf
==> No binary for hpcviewer-2021.03-cz4t4lloaq7yig52b6obbyknpc4rgyjf found: installing from source
==> Warning: microarchitecture specific optimizations are not supported yet on mixed compiler toolchains [check apple-clang@12.0.0 for further details]
==> Fetching http://hpctoolkit.org/download/hpcviewer/2021.03/hpcviewer-2021.03-macosx.cocoa.x86_64.zip
....
==> hpcviewer: Successfully installed hpcviewer-2021.03-cz4t4lloaq7yig52b6obbyknpc4rgyjf
  Fetch: 5.79s.  Build: 0.93s.  Total: 6.71s.
[+] /Users/pramod/Downloads/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-skylake/apple-clang-12.0.0/hpcviewer-2021.03-cz4t4lloaq7yig52b6obbyknpc4rgyjf
```

and it should be ready:

```
→ module load hpcviewer-2021.03-apple-clang-12.0.0-cz4t4ll
→ hpcviewer
```
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/666852/115094017-622dc700-9f1c-11eb-8894-6fccce376f63.png)
